excerpt: This light and healthy recipe is perfect for a quick and easy weeknight dinner.

instructions.name: Zucchini Noodles
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the spiralized zucchini and salt to the skillet and saut√© for 2-3 minutes until tender.
Remove from heat and set aside.

instructions.name: Avocado Pesto
instructions: In a food processor or blender, combine the avocado, basil leaves, lemon juice, garlic, salt, olive oil, and water.
Blend until smooth and creamy, adding additional water if needed to reach desired consistency.

instructions.name: Assembly
instructions: Divide the zucchini noodles between two plates.
Top with avocado pesto and serve immediately.
